caseTitle: Haji Khan Bhatti v. Province of Sindh through Provincial Election Commission and others
tagline: Interpreting the provision of Section 35 (1) (c) of the Sindh Local Government Act 2013, the Court holds that no person can seek his election on a reserved seat of a Council unless he is enrolled as a voter in the electoral rolls of any of the Wards that fall within the limits of such Council.
